body.name: Pampers Cruisers Diapers - Size 3, 84 Count, Disposable Active Baby Diapers with Custom Stretch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 53 mins
features: Pampers Cruisers diapers with our Custom Stretch Fit system are designed for active babies of all shapes and sizes
Adjusts to your baby’s unique shape with soft and secure ultra-stretchy sides
Perfect Custom Fit with our easy-to-use fit guide on the front of the diaper
Up to 100% leakproof with Dual Leak-Guard Barriers to protect where leaks happen most
Pampers Wetness Indicator lets you know when your baby might need a change
Gentle on skin, Cruisers are hypoallergenic and free of parabens and latex* (*Natural rubber)
Available in a variety of playful prints
body.description: Say hello to Custom Fit and reliable protection for the most active babies! Pampers Cruisers adjust to your baby’s unique shape and size with our Custom Stretch Fit System, featuring 2x stretchier* sides for a comfy, long-lasting fit perfect for babies on-the-go. Plus, our easy-to-use fit guide on the front of the diaper helps you get the perfect customized fit. So, no matter how much your baby moves, their diaper will stay put. Pampers Cruisers are also specially designed to deliver up to 100% leakproof protection thanks to our Dual Leak-Guard Barriers that gently seal around your little one’s legs and bottom to stop leaks where they happen most. Plus, Cruisers feature our LockAway Channels that absorb wetness and lock it away from skin. And forget about wondering when your baby needs a change. The Pampers Wetness Indicator lets you know, eliminating messy guesswork. Pampers Cruisers come in a variety of prints to protect your baby in style. Plus, Pampers Cruisers are hypoallergenic and free of parabens and latex,** so, they’re gentle on your baby’s skin. Pampers Cruisers diapers are available in sizes 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7. *Vs. the leading moving baby sub-brand **Natural rubber

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find the Right Fit Babies come in all shapes and sizes—follow these steps for a comfortable and secure fit Front Fit The diaper should fit just under your baby’s belly button Leg Cuff Fit After the diaper is on, run two fingers just inside the leg cuffs so there is no gapping or bunching Waist & Fastening When fastened, you should just about be able to run two fingers around the waist Signs of a Good Fit No leaks and no red marks when you remove the diaper

Our Commitment Caring for babies is in our DNA. Our Pampers Bright Beginnings programs enable healthy development and early success for babies and families through education, hospital partnerships, and donations March of Dimes Partnership Pampers is proud to support the March of Dimes in giving every baby a fighting chance. We help provide our smallest diapers to the 1 million babies born before 28-week gestational age each year Sustainability Pampers cares for every baby and the planet they grow up in. We maintain zero manufacturing to landfill across all our plants and are committed to 100% renewable electricity by 2030 Community Donations Through ongoing donation efforts and partnerships with organizations like Feeding America and Matthew 25, Pampers strives to help babies get the bright beginnings they deserve Changing Table Access 9 out of 10 dads have used a public restroom that lacks a changing table. As part of our “Love the Change” campaign, we’re providing 5,000 changing tables for men’s restrooms across North America Hospital Support Proud to be the #1 choice of U.S. hospitals for nearly 50 years, we partner with nurses to develop skin-protecting products and support nursing education—all to help baby’s healthy development

Are Pampers Cruisers right for my active baby? Yes! Cruisers adapt at the waist, legs and bottom and stay put, even when your baby doesn’t! Strong grips and 2x stretchier sides* give your baby the freedom to move while still staying protected. (*vs. the leading moving baby sub-brand) How do Pampers Cruisers help prevent leaks? Pampers Cruisers diapers feature Dual Leak-Guard Barriers that gently seal around baby’s legs to help prevent leaks where they happen most. The absorbent core absorbs wetness so baby’s skin can stay dry. Are Pampers Cruisers ingredients safe for my little one’s skin? Yes! All materials in Pampers diapers are carefully selected and thoroughly evaluated for safety and skin compatibility. Pampers is the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Brand and is free of parabens and latex.* (*Natural Rubber) What do you mean “packaging may vary”? We've recently made aesthetic changes. You may receive either package and product during this time. Rest assured your product is genuine and made by Pampers, but if you have questions please reach out to us directly. Is there anything special I need to know about changing a diaper? Pampers are designed to fit baby's shape for a snug, comfy fit. No need to fold the waistband in or out or to adjust the leg cuffs. Place tabs parallel to the waistband on the character strip. Use the characters as guides to evenly space fasteners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute prints, great leak protection
reviews.reviewText: Of all the Pampers diapers I have tried these cruisers are my favorite. The diapers themselves are softer on the outside and inside. They do have a baby powder scent which I am really not a fan of. If you like the scent then this will be great for you, but if you are sensitive to scents then I would not recommend these. The middle side edges have a nice stretch to them and an inner stretch wall that helps keep solids and liquids in. We have not had any leaks with these diapers and there have been some fuller diapers. The top front edge and top back edge do not have any stretch to them. The back tabs do have a nice stretch to them and the velcro holds well.As I said, of all the Pampers diapers I have tried these are by far my favorite. Just make note that there is a very strong baby powder scent to these.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pampers cruisers are my go to!
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best diaper on the market. Loved them with my first now live them even more with my second baby. Great diaper especially when baby transitions from being stationary to mobile.

I had been using Huggies till now and wanted to try pampers for a change but oh man...its night and day difference. Huggies absorbs more pee better, Pampers has a weird powdery stink that I havent had with any other diaper companies, and the material is so stiff on my baby that it actually makes it hard for her to move. Very disappointed since I though from reading other comments it would be alright but nope not worth it

I have used pampers for my baby always. I don’t know what the difference is but the swaddlers never leaked. Cruisers keep leaking all the time. It’s not that it’s a big size for my baby. She’s 8 months! My trip was ruined because her poop kept leaking out in the car seat!!!!
J’adore! Mon fils urine beaucoup et j’ai l’impression que ces couches absorbent mieux que les Huggies! En plus des motifs géniaux :)
